AccountPlanObjMeasCalcCond.name: AccountPlanObjMeasCalcCond
AccountPlanObjMeasCalcCond.description: Represents a field and value combination for filtering records to include in the calculation of a sales account plan objective measure’s current value.

AccountPlanObjMeasCalcDefId.description: The account plan objective measure calculation definition where this criteria is used.

FieldName.description: A field on the calculation definition’s TargetObject that you want to filter by. Fields on the Campaign, Case, Contact, or Opportunity objects are supported.

Operation.description: The logical operator for matching records with the specified field value.

Value.description: The value to match for the specified field.
